j4careSUUpdaterURL.title: Updater URL
j4careSUUpdaterURL.description: REST Endpoint URL for the external Updater service (f.e. Study Update CSV RS)

j4careSUUpdaterProperty.title: Updater Properties
j4careSUUpdaterProperty.description: Properties for Updater specific configuration in the form <name>=<value> - f.e. Seperator=,
